title: Video: What We Know About the New Van Rysel RCR-F — the Next ‘Budget’ Aero Pro Bike
content:
Van Rysel's new aero bike wasn't exactly a secret before, but we're now one step closer to its official launch.

Read the full article at Video: What We Know About the New Van Rysel RCR-F — the Next ‘Budget’ Aero Pro Bike on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
